3544    private float singlePerlin(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
3545        int x0 = fastFloor(x);
3546        int y0 = fastFloor(y);
3547        int z0 = fastFloor(z);
3548        int w0 = fastFloor(w);
3549        int u0 = fastFloor(u);
3550        int v0 = fastFloor(v);
3551        int x1 = x0 + 1;
3552        int y1 = y0 + 1;
3553        int z1 = z0 + 1;
3554        int w1 = w0 + 1;
3555        int u1 = u0 + 1;
3556        int v1 = v0 + 1;
3557
3558        float xs, ys, zs, ws, us, vs;
3559        switch (interpolation) {
3560            default:
3561            case LINEAR:
3562                xs = x - x0;
3563                ys = y - y0;
3564                zs = z - z0;
3565                ws = w - w0;
3566                us = u - u0;
3567                vs = v - v0;
3568                break;
3569            case HERMITE:
3570                xs = hermiteInterpolator(x - x0);
3571                ys = hermiteInterpolator(y - y0);
3572                zs = hermiteInterpolator(z - z0);
3573                ws = hermiteInterpolator(w - w0);
3574                us = hermiteInterpolator(u - u0);
3575                vs = hermiteInterpolator(v - v0);
3576                break;
3577            case QUINTIC:
3578                xs = quinticInterpolator(x - x0);
3579                ys = quinticInterpolator(y - y0);
3580                zs = quinticInterpolator(z - z0);
3581                ws = quinticInterpolator(w - w0);
3582                us = quinticInterpolator(u - u0);
3583                vs = quinticInterpolator(v - v0);
3584                break;
3585        }
3586
3587        final float xd0 = x - x0;
3588        final float yd0 = y - y0;
3589        final float zd0 = z - z0;
3590        final float wd0 = w - w0;
3591        final float ud0 = u - u0;
3592        final float vd0 = v - v0;
3593        final float xd1 = xd0 - 1;
3594        final float yd1 = yd0 - 1;

3656        final float zf000 = lerp(yf0000, yf1000, zs);
3657        final float zf100 = lerp(yf0100, yf1100, zs);
3658
3659        final float zf010 = lerp(yf0010, yf1010, zs);
3660        final float zf110 = lerp(yf0110, yf1110, zs);
3661
3662        final float zf001 = lerp(yf0001, yf1001, zs);
3663        final float zf101 = lerp(yf0101, yf1101, zs);
3664
3665        final float zf011 = lerp(yf0011, yf1011, zs);
3666        final float zf111 = lerp(yf0111, yf1111, zs);
3667
3668        final float wf00 = lerp(zf000, zf100, ws);
3669        final float wf10 = lerp(zf010, zf110, ws);
3670        final float wf01 = lerp(zf001, zf101, ws);
3671        final float wf11 = lerp(zf011, zf111, ws);
3672
3673        final float uf0 = lerp(wf00, wf10, us);
3674        final float uf1 = lerp(wf01, wf11, us);
3675
3676        return lerp(uf0, uf1, vs) * 1.61f;
3677    }
3678    private float singlePerlinFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
3679        int seed = this.seed;
3680        float sum = singlePerlin(seed, x, y, z, w, u, v);
3681        float amp = 1;
3682
3683        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3684            x *= lacunarity;
3685            y *= lacunarity;
3686            z *= lacunarity;
3687            w *= lacunarity;
3688            u *= lacunarity;
3689            v *= lacunarity;
3690
3691            amp *= gain;
3692            sum += singlePerlin(++seed, x, y, z, w, u, v) * amp;
3693        }
3694
3695        return sum * fractalBounding;
3696    }
3697
3698    private float singlePerlinFractalBillow(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
3699        int seed = this.seed;
3700        float sum = Math.abs(singlePerlin(seed, x, y, z, w, u, v)) * 2 - 1;
3701        float amp = 1;
3702
3703        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3704            if(fractalSpiral){
3705                final float x2 = rotateX6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3706                final float y2 = rotateY6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3707                final float z2 = rotateZ6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3708                final float w2 = rotateW6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3709                final float u2 = rotateU6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3710                final float v2 = rotateV6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3711                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2; w = w2; u = u2; v = v2;
3712            }
3713            x *= lacunarity;
3714            y *= lacunarity;
3715            z *= lacunarity;
3716            w *= lacunarity;
3717            u *= lacunarity;
3718            v *= lacunarity;
3719
3720            amp *= gain;
3721            sum += (Math.abs(singlePerlin(++seed, x, y, z, w, u, v)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
3722        }
3723
3724        return sum * fractalBounding;
3725    }
3726
3727    private float singlePerlinFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
3728        int seed = this.seed;
3729        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
3730        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
3731            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singlePerlin(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u, v));
3732            correction += (exp *= 0.5f);
3733            sum += spike * exp;
3734            if(fractalSpiral){
3735                final float x2 = rotateX6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3736                final float y2 = rotateY6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3737                final float z2 = rotateZ6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3738                final float w2 = rotateW6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3739                final float u2 = rotateU6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3740                final float v2 = rotateV6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3741                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2; w = w2; u = u2; v = v2;
3742            }
3743            x *= lacunarity;
3744            y *= lacunarity;
3745            z *= lacunarity;
3746            w *= lacunarity;
3747            u *= lacunarity;
3748            v *= lacunarity;
3749        }
3750        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
3751    }

3753    // Simplex Noise
3754    public float getSimplexFractal(float x, float y, float z) {
3755        x *= frequency;
3756        y *= frequency;
3757        z *= frequency;
3758
3759        switch (fractalType) {
3760            case FBM:
3761                return singleSimplexFractalFBM(x, y, z);
3762            case BILLOW:
3763                return singleSimplexFractalBillow(x, y, z);
3764            case RIDGED_MULTI:
3765                return singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z);
3766            default:
3767                return 0;
3768        }
3769    }

3771    /**
3772     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
3773     * (2) and gain (0.5) in 3D.
3774     * @param x
3775     * @param y
3776     * @param z
3777     * @param seed
3778     * @param octaves
3779     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
3780     */
3781    public float layered3D(float x, float y, float z, int seed, int octaves)
3782    {
3783        x *= 0.03125f;
3784        y *= 0.03125f;
3785        z *= 0.03125f;
3786
3787        float sum = 1 - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z));
3788        float amp = 1;
3789
3790        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3791            x *= 2f;
3792            y *= 2f;
3793            z *= 2f;
3794
3795            amp *= 0.5f;
3796            sum -= (1 - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z))) * amp;
3797        }
3798        amp = gain;
3799        float ampFractal = 1;
3800        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3801            ampFractal += amp;
3802            amp *= gain;
3803        }
3804        return sum / ampFractal;
3805    }

3807     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity

3810     * @param y
3811     * @param z
3812     * @param seed
3813     * @param octaves
3814     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
3815     */

3820        z *= frequency;

3824
3825        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3826            x *= 2f;
3827            y *= 2f;
3828            z *= 2f;
3829
3830            amp *= 0.5f;
3831            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z) * amp;
3832        }
3833        amp = gain;
3834        float ampFractal = 1;
3835        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3836            ampFractal += amp;
3837            amp *= gain;
3838        }

3840    }

3986    /**
3987     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and specified lacunarity (the amount of
3988     * frequency change between octaves); gain is not used.
3989     * @param x
3990     * @param y
3991     * @param z
3992     * @param seed any int
3993     * @param octaves how many "layers of detail" to generate; at least 1, but note this slows down with many octaves
3994     * @param frequency often about {@code 1f / 32f}, but generally adjusted for the use case
3995     * @param lacunarity when {@code octaves} is 2 or more, this affects the change between layers
3996     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
3997     */
3998    public float ridged3D(float x, float y, float z, int seed, int octaves, float frequency, float lacunarity)
3999    {
4000        x *= frequency;
4001        y *= frequency;
4002        z *= frequency;
4003
4004        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
4005        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4006            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z));
4007            correction += (exp *= 0.5f);
4008            sum += spike * exp;
4009            if(fractalSpiral){
4010                final float x2 = rotateX3D(x, y, z);
4011                final float y2 = rotateY3D(x, y, z);
4012                final float z2 = rotateZ3D(x, y, z);
4013                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2;
4014            }
4015            x *= lacunarity;
4016            y *= lacunarity;
4017            z *= lacunarity;
4018        }
4019        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
4020    }

4025        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {

4028            sum += spike * exp;

4030                final float x2 = rotateX3D(x, y, z);
4031                final float y2 = rotateY3D(x, y, z);
4032                final float z2 = rotateZ3D(x, y, z);
4033                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2;

4041
4042    public float getSimplex(float x, float y, float z) {
4043        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency, z * frequency);
4044    }
4045
4046    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y, float z) {
4047        float t = (x + y + z) * F3f;
4048        int i = fastFloor(x + t);
4049        int j = fastFloor(y + t);
4050        int k = fastFloor(z + t);
4051
4052        t = (i + j + k) * G3f;
4053        float x0 = x - (i - t);
4054        float y0 = y - (j - t);
4055        float z0 = z - (k - t);
4056
4057        int i1, j1, k1;
4058        int i2, j2, k2;
4059
4060        if (x0 >= y0) {
4061            if (y0 >= z0) {
4062                i1 = 1;
4063                j1 = 0;
4064                k1 = 0;
4065                i2 = 1;
4066                j2 = 1;
4067                k2 = 0;
4068            } else if (x0 >= z0) {
4069                i1 = 1;
4070                j1 = 0;
4071                k1 = 0;
4072                i2 = 1;
4073                j2 = 0;
4074                k2 = 1;
4075            } else // x0 < z0
4076            {
4077                i1 = 0;
4078                j1 = 0;
4079                k1 = 1;
4080                i2 = 1;
4081                j2 = 0;
4082                k2 = 1;
4083            }
4084        } else // x0 < y0
4085        {
4086            if (y0 < z0) {
4087                i1 = 0;
4088                j1 = 0;
4089                k1 = 1;
4090                i2 = 0;
4091                j2 = 1;
4092                k2 = 1;
4093            } else if (x0 < z0) {
4094                i1 = 0;
4095                j1 = 1;
4096                k1 = 0;
4097                i2 = 0;
4098                j2 = 1;
4099                k2 = 1;
4100            } else // x0 >= z0
4101            {
4102                i1 = 0;
4103                j1 = 1;
4104                k1 = 0;
4105                i2 = 1;
4106                j2 = 1;
4107                k2 = 0;
4108            }
4109        }
4110
4111        float x1 = x0 - i1 + G3f;
4112        float y1 = y0 - j1 + G3f;
4113        float z1 = z0 - k1 + G3f;
4114        float x2 = x0 - i2 + F3f;
4115        float y2 = y0 - j2 + F3f;
4116        float z2 = z0 - k2 + F3f;
4117        float x3 = x0 - 0.5f;
4118        float y3 = y0 - 0.5f;
4119        float z3 = z0 - 0.5f;
4120
4121        float n = 0;
4122
4123        t = 0.6f - x0 * x0 - y0 * y0 - z0 * z0;
4124        if (t > 0) {
4125            t *= t;
4126            n += t * t * gradCoord3D(seed, i, j, k, x0, y0, z0);
4127        }
4128
4129        t = 0.6f - x1 * x1 - y1 * y1 - z1 * z1;
4130        if (t > 0) {
4131            t *= t;
4132            n += t * t * gradCoord3D(seed, i + i1, j + j1, k + k1, x1, y1, z1);
4133        }
4134
4135        t = 0.6f - x2 * x2 - y2 * y2 - z2 * z2;
4136        if (t > 0) {
4137            t *= t;
4138            n += t * t * gradCoord3D(seed, i + i2, j + j2, k + k2, x2, y2, z2);
4139        }
4140
4141        t = 0.6f - x3 * x3 - y3 * y3 - z3 * z3;
4142        if (t > 0)  {
4143            t *= t;
4144            n += t * t * gradCoord3D(seed, i + 1, j + 1, k + 1, x3, y3, z3);
4145        }
4146
4147        return 31.5f * n;
4148    }

4150    public float getSimplexFractal(float x, float y) {
4151        x *= frequency;
4152        y *= frequency;
4153
4154        switch (fractalType) {
4155            case FBM:
4156                return singleSimplexFractalFBM(x, y);
4157            case BILLOW:
4158                return singleSimplexFractalBillow(x, y);
4159            case RIDGED_MULTI:
4160                return singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(x, y);
4161            default:
4162                return 0;
4163        }
4164    }

4166    /**
4167     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
4168     * (2) and gain (0.5) in 2D.
4169     * @param x
4170     * @param y
4171     * @param seed
4172     * @param octaves
4173     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
4174     */
4175    public float layered2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves)
4176    {
4177        x *= 0.03125f;
4178        y *= 0.03125f;
4179
4180        float sum = 1 - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y));
4181        float amp = 1;
4182
4183        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4184            x *= 2f;
4185            y *= 2f;
4186
4187            amp *= 0.5f;
4188            sum -= (1 - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y))) * amp;
4189        }
4190        amp = gain;
4191        float ampFractal = 1;
4192        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4193            ampFractal += amp;
4194            amp *= gain;
4195        }
4196        return sum / ampFractal;
4197    }

4263    /**

4268     * @param seed
4269     * @param octaves
4270     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
4271     */
4272    public float layered2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves, float frequency, float lacunarity, float gain)
4273    {
4274        x *= frequency;
4275        y *= frequency;
4276
4277        float sum = singleSimplex(seed, x, y);
4278        float amp = 1;
4279
4280        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4281            x *= lacunarity;
4282            y *= lacunarity;
4283
4284            amp *= gain;
4285            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y) * amp;
4286        }
4287        amp = gain;
4288        float ampFractal = 1;
4289        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4290            ampFractal += amp;
4291            amp *= gain;
4292        }
4293        return sum / ampFractal;
4294    }
4295
4296    private float singleSimplexFractalFBM(float x, float y) {
4297        int seed = this.seed;
4298        float sum = singleSimplex(seed, x, y);
4299        float amp = 1;
4300
4301        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4302            x *= lacunarity;
4303            y *= lacunarity;
4304
4305            amp *= gain;
4306            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y) * amp;
4307        }
4308
4309        return sum * fractalBounding;
4310    }
4311
4312    private float singleSimplexFractalBillow(float x, float y) {
4313        int seed = this.seed;
4314        float sum = Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y)) * 2 - 1;
4315        float amp = 1;
4316
4317        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4318            if(fractalSpiral){
4319                final float x2 = rotateX2D(x, y);
4320                final float y2 = rotateY2D(x, y);
4321                x = x2; y = y2;
4322            }
4323            x *= lacunarity;
4324            y *= lacunarity;
4325            amp *= gain;
4326            sum += (Math.abs(singleSimplex(++seed, x, y)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
4327        }
4328
4329        return sum * fractalBounding;
4330    }

4332    /**
4333     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
4334     * (2) and gain (0.5).
4335     * @param x
4336     * @param y
4337     * @param seed
4338     * @param octaves
4339     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
4340     */
4341    public float ridged2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves)
4342    {
4343        return ridged2D(x, y, seed, octaves, 0.03125f, 2f);
4344    }
4345    /**
4346     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
4347     * (2) and gain (0.5).
4348     * @param x
4349     * @param y
4350     * @param seed
4351     * @param octaves
4352     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
4353     */
4354    public float ridged2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves, float frequency)
4355    {
4356        return ridged2D(x, y, seed, octaves, frequency, 2f);
4357    }
4358    /**
4359     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and specified lacunarity (the amount of
4360     * frequency change between octaves); gain is not used.
4361     * @param x
4362     * @param y
4363     * @param seed any int
4364     * @param octaves how many "layers of detail" to generate; at least 1, but note this slows down with many octaves
4365     * @param frequency often about {@code 1f / 32f}, but generally adjusted for the use case
4366     * @param lacunarity when {@code octaves} is 2 or more, this affects the change between layers
4367     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
4368     */
4369    public float ridged2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves, float frequency, float lacunarity)
4370    {
4371        x *= frequency;
4372        y *= frequency;
4373
4374        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
4375        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4376            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y));
4377            correction += (exp *= 0.5f);
4378            sum += spike * exp;
4379            if(fractalSpiral){
4380                final float x2 = rotateX2D(x, y);
4381                final float y2 = rotateY2D(x, y);
4382                x = x2; y = y2;
4383            }
4384            x *= lacunarity;
4385            y *= lacunarity;
4386        }
4387        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
4388    }
4389
4390    private float singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y) {
4391        int seed = this.seed;
4392        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
4393        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4394            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y));
4395            correction += (exp *= 0.5f);
4396            sum += spike * exp;
4397            if(fractalSpiral){
4398                final float x2 = rotateX2D(x, y);
4399                final float y2 = rotateY2D(x, y);
4400                x = x2; y = y2;
4401            }
4402            x *= lacunarity;
4403            y *= lacunarity;
4404        }
4405        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
4406    }
4407
4408    public float getSimplex(float x, float y) {
4409        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency);
4410    }
4411
4412    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y) {
4413        float t = (x + y) * F2f;
4414        int i = fastFloor(x + t);
4415        int j = fastFloor(y + t);
4416
4417        t = (i + j) * G2f;
4418        float X0 = i - t;
4419        float Y0 = j - t;
4420
4421        float x0 = x - X0;
4422        float y0 = y - Y0;
4423
4424        int i1, j1;
4425        if (x0 > y0) {
4426            i1 = 1;
4427            j1 = 0;
4428        } else {
4429            i1 = 0;
4430            j1 = 1;
4431        }
4432
4433        float x1 = x0 - i1 + G2f;
4434        float y1 = y0 - j1 + G2f;
4435        float x2 = x0 - 1 + H2f;
4436        float y2 = y0 - 1 + H2f;
4437
4438        float n = 0f;
4439
4440        t = 0.5f - x0 * x0 - y0 * y0;
4441        if (t >= 0) {
4442            t *= t;
4443            n += t * t * gradCoord2D(seed, i, j, x0, y0);
4444        }
4445
4446        t = 0.5f - x1 * x1 - y1 * y1;
4447        if (t > 0) {
4448            t *= t;
4449            n += t * t * gradCoord2D(seed, i + i1, j + j1, x1, y1);
4450        }
4451
4452        t = 0.5f - x2 * x2 - y2 * y2;
4453        if (t > 0)  {
4454            t *= t;
4455            n += t * t * gradCoord2D(seed, i + 1, j + 1, x2, y2);
4456        }
4457        return n * 99.20689070704672f; // this is 99.83685446303647 / 1.00635 ; the first number was found by kdotjpg
4458    }
4459
4460    public float getSimplex(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4461        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency, z * frequency, w * frequency);
4462    }
4463
4464    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4465        float n = 0f;
4466        float t = (x + y + z + w) * F4f;
4467        int i = fastFloor(x + t);
4468        int j = fastFloor(y + t);
4469        int k = fastFloor(z + t);
4470        int l = fastFloor(w + t);
4471        t = (i + j + k + l) * G4f;
4472        final float X0 = i - t;
4473        final float Y0 = j - t;
4474        final float Z0 = k - t;
4475        final float W0 = l - t;
4476        final float x0 = x - X0;
4477        final float y0 = y - Y0;
4478        final float z0 = z - Z0;
4479        final float w0 = w - W0;
4480
4481        final int[] SIMPLEX_4D = FastNoise.SIMPLEX_4D;
4482        final int c = (x0 > y0 ? 128 : 0) | (x0 > z0 ? 64 : 0) | (y0 > z0 ? 32 : 0) | (x0 > w0 ? 16 : 0) | (y0 > w0 ? 8 : 0) | (z0 > w0 ? 4 : 0);
4483        final int ip = SIMPLEX_4D[c];
4484        final int jp = SIMPLEX_4D[c + 1];
4485        final int kp = SIMPLEX_4D[c + 2];
4486        final int lp = SIMPLEX_4D[c + 3];
4487
4488        final int i1 = ip >> 2;
4489        final int i2 = ip >> 1 & 1;
4490        final int i3 = ip & 1;
4491        final int j1 = jp >> 2;
4492        final int j2 = jp >> 1 & 1;
4493        final int j3 = jp & 1;
4494        final int k1 = kp >> 2;
4495        final int k2 = kp >> 1 & 1;
4496        final int k3 = kp & 1;
4497        final int l1 = lp >> 2;
4498        final int l2 = lp >> 1 & 1;
4499        final int l3 = lp & 1;
4500
4501        final float x1 = x0 - i1 + G4f;
4502        final float y1 = y0 - j1 + G4f;
4503        final float z1 = z0 - k1 + G4f;
4504        final float w1 = w0 - l1 + G4f;
4505        final float x2 = x0 - i2 + 2 * G4f;
4506        final float y2 = y0 - j2 + 2 * G4f;
4507        final float z2 = z0 - k2 + 2 * G4f;
4508        final float w2 = w0 - l2 + 2 * G4f;
4509        final float x3 = x0 - i3 + 3 * G4f;
4510        final float y3 = y0 - j3 + 3 * G4f;
4511        final float z3 = z0 - k3 + 3 * G4f;
4512        final float w3 = w0 - l3 + 3 * G4f;
4513        final float x4 = x0 - 1 + 4 * G4f;
4514        final float y4 = y0 - 1 + 4 * G4f;
4515        final float z4 = z0 - 1 + 4 * G4f;
4516        final float w4 = w0 - 1 + 4 * G4f;
4517
4518        t = 0.75f - x0 * x0 - y0 * y0 - z0 * z0 - w0 * w0;
4519        if (t > 0) {
4520            t *= t;
4521            n = t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i, j, k, l, x0, y0, z0, w0);
4522        }
4523        t = 0.75f - x1 * x1 - y1 * y1 - z1 * z1 - w1 * w1;
4524        if (t > 0) {
4525            t *= t;
4526            n += t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i + i1, j + j1, k + k1, l + l1, x1, y1, z1, w1);
4527        }
4528        t = 0.75f - x2 * x2 - y2 * y2 - z2 * z2 - w2 * w2;
4529        if (t > 0) {
4530            t *= t;
4531            n += t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i + i2, j + j2, k + k2, l + l2, x2, y2, z2, w2);
4532        }
4533        t = 0.75f - x3 * x3 - y3 * y3 - z3 * z3 - w3 * w3;
4534        if (t > 0) {
4535            t *= t;
4536            n += t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i + i3, j + j3, k + k3, l + l3, x3, y3, z3, w3);
4537        }
4538        t = 0.75f - x4 * x4 - y4 * y4 - z4 * z4 - w4 * w4;
4539        if (t > 0) {
4540            t *= t;
4541            n += t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i + 1, j + 1, k + 1, l + 1, x4, y4, z4, w4);
4542        }
4543
4544        return 4.9f * n;
4545    }

4548    public float getSimplexFractal(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4549        x *= frequency;
4550        y *= frequency;
4551        z *= frequency;
4552        w *= frequency;
4553
4554        switch (fractalType) {
4555            case FBM:
4556                return singleSimplexFractalFBM(x, y, z, w);
4557            case BILLOW:
4558                return singleSimplexFractalBillow(x, y, z, w);
4559            case RIDGED_MULTI:
4560                return singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z, w);
4561            default:
4562                return 0;
4563        }
4564    }

4566    private float singleSimplexFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4567        int seed = this.seed;
4568        float sum = singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z, w);
4569        float amp = 1;
4570
4571        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4572            x *= lacunarity;
4573            y *= lacunarity;
4574            z *= lacunarity;
4575            w *= lacunarity;
4576
4577            amp *= gain;
4578            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w) * amp;
4579        }
4580
4581        return sum * fractalBounding;
4582    }
4583
4584    private float singleSimplexFractalBillow(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4585        int seed = this.seed;
4586        float sum = Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z, w)) * 2 - 1;
4587        float amp = 1;
4588
4589        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4590            if(fractalSpiral){
4591                final float x2 = rotateX4D(x, y, z, w);
4592                final float y2 = rotateY4D(x, y, z, w);
4593                final float z2 = rotateZ4D(x, y, z, w);
4594                final float w2 = rotateW4D(x, y, z, w);
4595                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2; w = w2;
4596            }
4597            x *= lacunarity;
4598            y *= lacunarity;
4599            z *= lacunarity;
4600            w *= lacunarity;
4601
4602            amp *= gain;
4603            sum += (Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
4604        }
4605
4606        return sum * fractalBounding;
4607    }
4608    private float singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4609        int seed = this.seed;
4610        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
4611        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4612            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w));
4613            correction += (exp *= 0.5f);
4614            sum += spike * exp;
4615            if(fractalSpiral){
4616                final float x2 = rotateX4D(x, y, z, w);
4617                final float y2 = rotateY4D(x, y, z, w);
4618                final float z2 = rotateZ4D(x, y, z, w);
4619                final float w2 = rotateW4D(x, y, z, w);
4620                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2; w = w2;
4621            }
4622            x *= lacunarity;
4623            y *= lacunarity;
4624            z *= lacunarity;
4625            w *= lacunarity;
4626        }
4627        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
4628    }
4629
4630    // 5D Simplex
4631
4632    private static final float
4633            F5 = (float) ((Math.sqrt(6.0) - 1.0) / 5.0),
4634            G5 = (float) ((6.0 - Math.sqrt(6.0)) / 30.0),
4635            LIMIT5 = 0.7f;
4636
4637    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4638        float n0, n1, n2, n3, n4, n5;
4639        float t = (x + y + z + w + u) * F5;
4640        int i = fastFloor(x + t);
4641        int j = fastFloor(y + t);
4642        int k = fastFloor(z + t);
4643        int l = fastFloor(w + t);
4644        int h = fastFloor(u + t);
4645        t = (i + j + k + l + h) * G5;
4646        float X0 = i - t;
4647        float Y0 = j - t;
4648        float Z0 = k - t;
4649        float W0 = l - t;
4650        float U0 = h - t;
4651        float x0 = x - X0;
4652        float y0 = y - Y0;
4653        float z0 = z - Z0;
4654        float w0 = w - W0;
4655        float u0 = u - U0;
4656
4657        int rankx = 0;
4658        int ranky = 0;
4659        int rankz = 0;
4660        int rankw = 0;
4661        int ranku = 0;
4662
4663        if (x0 > y0) rankx++; else ranky++;
4664        if (x0 > z0) rankx++; else rankz++;
4665        if (x0 > w0) rankx++; else rankw++;
4666        if (x0 > u0) rankx++; else ranku++;
4667
4668        if (y0 > z0) ranky++; else rankz++;
4669        if (y0 > w0) ranky++; else rankw++;
4670        if (y0 > u0) ranky++; else ranku++;
4671
4672        if (z0 > w0) rankz++; else rankw++;
4673        if (z0 > u0) rankz++; else ranku++;
4674
4675        if (w0 > u0) rankw++; else ranku++;
4676
4677        int i1 = 3 - rankx >>> 31;
4678        int j1 = 3 - ranky >>> 31;
4679        int k1 = 3 - rankz >>> 31;
4680        int l1 = 3 - rankw >>> 31;
4681        int h1 = 3 - ranku >>> 31;
4682
4683        int i2 = 2 - rankx >>> 31;
4684        int j2 = 2 - ranky >>> 31;
4685        int k2 = 2 - rankz >>> 31;
4686        int l2 = 2 - rankw >>> 31;
4687        int h2 = 2 - ranku >>> 31;
4688
4689        int i3 = 1 - rankx >>> 31;
4690        int j3 = 1 - ranky >>> 31;
4691        int k3 = 1 - rankz >>> 31;
4692        int l3 = 1 - rankw >>> 31;
4693        int h3 = 1 - ranku >>> 31;
4694
4695        int i4 = -rankx >>> 31;
4696        int j4 = -ranky >>> 31;
4697        int k4 = -rankz >>> 31;
4698        int l4 = -rankw >>> 31;
4699        int h4 = -ranku >>> 31;
4700
4701        float x1 = x0 - i1 + G5;
4702        float y1 = y0 - j1 + G5;
4703        float z1 = z0 - k1 + G5;
4704        float w1 = w0 - l1 + G5;
4705        float u1 = u0 - h1 + G5;
4706
4707        float x2 = x0 - i2 + 2 * G5;
4708        float y2 = y0 - j2 + 2 * G5;
4709        float z2 = z0 - k2 + 2 * G5;
4710        float w2 = w0 - l2 + 2 * G5;
4711        float u2 = u0 - h2 + 2 * G5;
4712
4713        float x3 = x0 - i3 + 3 * G5;
4714        float y3 = y0 - j3 + 3 * G5;
4715        float z3 = z0 - k3 + 3 * G5;
4716        float w3 = w0 - l3 + 3 * G5;
4717        float u3 = u0 - h3 + 3 * G5;
4718
4719        float x4 = x0 - i4 + 4 * G5;
4720        float y4 = y0 - j4 + 4 * G5;
4721        float z4 = z0 - k4 + 4 * G5;
4722        float w4 = w0 - l4 + 4 * G5;
4723        float u4 = u0 - h4 + 4 * G5;
4724
4725        float x5 = x0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4726        float y5 = y0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4727        float z5 = z0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4728        float w5 = w0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4729        float u5 = u0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4730
4731        t = LIMIT5 - x0 * x0 - y0 * y0 - z0 * z0 - w0 * w0 - u0 * u0;
4732        if (t < 0) n0 = 0;
4733        else
4734        {
4735            t *= t;
4736            n0 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i, j, k, l, h, x0, y0, z0, w0, u0);
4737        }
4738
4739        t = LIMIT5 - x1 * x1 - y1 * y1 - z1 * z1 - w1 * w1 - u1 * u1;
4740        if (t < 0) n1 = 0;
4741        else
4742        {
4743            t *= t;
4744            n1 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + i1, j + j1, k + k1, l + l1, h + h1, x1, y1, z1, w1, u1);
4745        }
4746
4747        t = LIMIT5 - x2 * x2 - y2 * y2 - z2 * z2 - w2 * w2 - u2 * u2;
4748        if (t < 0) n2 = 0;
4749        else
4750        {
4751            t *= t;
4752            n2 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + i2, j + j2, k + k2, l + l2, h + h2, x2, y2, z2, w2, u2);
4753        }
4754
4755        t = LIMIT5 - x3 * x3 - y3 * y3 - z3 * z3 - w3 * w3 - u3 * u3;
4756        if (t < 0) n3 = 0;
4757        else
4758        {
4759            t *= t;
4760            n3 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + i3, j + j3, k + k3, l + l3, h + h3, x3, y3, z3, w3, u3);
4761        }
4762
4763        t = LIMIT5 - x4 * x4 - y4 * y4 - z4 * z4 - w4 * w4 - u4 * u4;
4764        if (t < 0) n4 = 0;
4765        else
4766        {
4767            t *= t;
4768            n4 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + i4, j + j4, k + k4, l + l4, h + h4, x4, y4, z4, w4, u4);
4769        }
4770
4771        t = LIMIT5 - x5 * x5 - y5 * y5 - z5 * z5 - w5 * w5 - u5 * u5;
4772        if (t < 0) n5 = 0;
4773        else
4774        {
4775            t *= t;
4776            n5 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + 1, j + 1, k + 1, l + 1, h + 1, x5, y5, z5, w5, u5);
4777        }
4778
4779        return  (n0 + n1 + n2 + n3 + n4 + n5) * 10f; 
4780    }

4782    public float getSimplex(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4783        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency, z * frequency, w * frequency, u * frequency);
4784    }

4788        y *= frequency;
4789        z *= frequency;
4790        w *= frequency;
4791        u *= frequency;
4792
4793        switch (fractalType) {
4794            case FBM:
4795                return singleSimplexFractalFBM(x, y, z, w, u);
4796            case BILLOW:
4797                return singleSimplexFractalBillow(x, y, z, w, u);
4798            case RIDGED_MULTI:
4799                return singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z, w, u);
4800            default:
4801                return 0;
4802        }
4803    }
4804
4805    private float singleSimplexFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4806        int seed = this.seed;
4807        float sum = singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z, w, u);
4808        float amp = 1;
4809
4810        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4811            x *= lacunarity;
4812            y *= lacunarity;
4813            z *= lacunarity;
4814            w *= lacunarity;
4815            u *= lacunarity;
4816
4817            amp *= gain;
4818            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u) * amp;
4819        }
4820
4821        return sum * fractalBounding;
4822    }
4823
4824    private float singleSimplexFractalBillow(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4825        int seed = this.seed;
4826        float sum = Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z, w, u)) * 2 - 1;
4827        float amp = 1;
4828
4829        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4830            if(fractalSpiral){
4831                final float x2 = rotateX5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4832                final float y2 = rotateY5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4833                final float z2 = rotateZ5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4834                final float w2 = rotateW5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4835                final float u2 = rotateU5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4836                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2; w = w2; u = u2;
4837            }
4838            x *= lacunarity;
4839            y *= lacunarity;
4840            z *= lacunarity;
4841            w *= lacunarity;
4842            u *= lacunarity;
4843
4844            amp *= gain;
4845            sum += (Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
4846        }
4847
4848        return sum * fractalBounding;
4849    }

4851    private float singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4852        int seed = this.seed;
4853        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
4854        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4855            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u));
4856            correction += (exp *= 0.5f);
4857            sum += spike * exp;
4858            if(fractalSpiral){
4859                final float x2 = rotateX5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4860                final float y2 = rotateY5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4861                final float z2 = rotateZ5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4862                final float w2 = rotateW5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4863                final float u2 = rotateU5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4864                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2; w = w2; u = u2;
4865            }
4866            x *= lacunarity;
4867            y *= lacunarity;
4868            z *= lacunarity;
4869            w *= lacunarity;
4870            u *= lacunarity;
4871        }
4872        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
4873    }
4874
4875    // 6D Simplex
4876
4877    private final transient float[] m = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0}, cellDist = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
4878    private final transient int[] distOrder = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0}, intLoc = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
4879
4880    private static final float
4881            F6 = (float) ((Math.sqrt(7.0) - 1.0) / 6.0),
4882            G6 = F6 / (1f + 6f * F6),
4883            LIMIT6 = 0.8375f;
4884
4885
4886    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
4887        final float s = (x + y + z + w + u + v) * F6;
4888
4889        final int skewX = fastFloor(x + s), skewY = fastFloor(y + s), skewZ = fastFloor(z + s),
4890                skewW = fastFloor(w + s), skewU = fastFloor(u + s), skewV = fastFloor(v + s);
4891        intLoc[0] = skewX;
4892        intLoc[1] = skewY;
4893        intLoc[2] = skewZ;
4894        intLoc[3] = skewW;
4895        intLoc[4] = skewU;
4896        intLoc[5] = skewV;
4897
4898        final float unskew = (skewX + skewY + skewZ + skewW + skewU + skewV) * G6;
4899        cellDist[0] = x - skewX + unskew;
4900        cellDist[1] = y - skewY + unskew;
4901        cellDist[2] = z - skewZ + unskew;
4902        cellDist[3] = w - skewW + unskew;
4903        cellDist[4] = u - skewU + unskew;
4904        cellDist[5] = v - skewV + unskew;
4905
4906        int o0 = (cellDist[0]<cellDist[1]?1:0)+(cellDist[0]<cellDist[2]?1:0)+(cellDist[0]<cellDist[3]?1:0)+(cellDist[0]<cellDist[4]?1:0)+(cellDist[0]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4907        int o1 = (cellDist[1]<=cellDist[0]?1:0)+(cellDist[1]<cellDist[2]?1:0)+(cellDist[1]<cellDist[3]?1:0)+(cellDist[1]<cellDist[4]?1:0)+(cellDist[1]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4908        int o2 = (cellDist[2]<=cellDist[0]?1:0)+(cellDist[2]<=cellDist[1]?1:0)+(cellDist[2]<cellDist[3]?1:0)+(cellDist[2]<cellDist[4]?1:0)+(cellDist[2]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4909        int o3 = (cellDist[3]<=cellDist[0]?1:0)+(cellDist[3]<=cellDist[1]?1:0)+(cellDist[3]<=cellDist[2]?1:0)+(cellDist[3]<cellDist[4]?1:0)+(cellDist[3]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4910        int o4 = (cellDist[4]<=cellDist[0]?1:0)+(cellDist[4]<=cellDist[1]?1:0)+(cellDist[4]<=cellDist[2]?1:0)+(cellDist[4]<=cellDist[3]?1:0)+(cellDist[4]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4911        int o5 = 15-(o0+o1+o2+o3+o4);
4912
4913        distOrder[o0]=0;
4914        distOrder[o1]=1;
4915        distOrder[o2]=2;
4916        distOrder[o3]=3;
4917        distOrder[o4]=4;
4918        distOrder[o5]=5;
4919
4920        float n = 0;
4921        float skewOffset = 0;
4922
4923        for (int c = -1; c < 6; c++) {
4924            if (c != -1) intLoc[distOrder[c]]++;
4925
4926            m[0] = cellDist[0] - (intLoc[0] - skewX) + skewOffset;
4927            m[1] = cellDist[1] - (intLoc[1] - skewY) + skewOffset;
4928            m[2] = cellDist[2] - (intLoc[2] - skewZ) + skewOffset;
4929            m[3] = cellDist[3] - (intLoc[3] - skewW) + skewOffset;
4930            m[4] = cellDist[4] - (intLoc[4] - skewU) + skewOffset;
4931            m[5] = cellDist[5] - (intLoc[5] - skewV) + skewOffset;
4932
4933            float tc = LIMIT6;
4934
4935            for (int d = 0; d < 6; d++) {
4936                tc -= m[d] * m[d];
4937            }
4938
4939            if (tc > 0) { 
4940                tc *= tc;
4941                n += gradCoord6D(seed, intLoc[0], intLoc[1], intLoc[2], intLoc[3], intLoc[4], intLoc[5],
4942                        m[0], m[1], m[2], m[3], m[4], m[5]) * tc * tc;
4943            }
4944            skewOffset += G6;
4945        }
4946        return 7.5f * n;
4947
4948    }
4949
4950    public float getSimplex(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
4951        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency, z * frequency, w * frequency, u * frequency, v * frequency);
4952    }

4955        x *= frequency;
4956        y *= frequency;
4957        z *= frequency;
4958        w *= frequency;
4959        u *= frequency;
4960        v *= frequency;
4961
4962        switch (fractalType) {
4963            case FBM:

4965            case BILLOW:

4967            case RIDGED_MULTI:

4978

4985            v *= lacunarity;

4989        }
4990
4991        return sum * fractalBounding;

5133    private final static float CUBIC_3D_BOUNDING = 2f / (1.5f * 1.5f * 1.5f);
5134
5135    private float singleCubic(int seed, float x, float y, float z) {
5136        int x1 = fastFloor(x);
5137        int y1 = fastFloor(y);
5138        int z1 = fastFloor(z);
5139
5140        int x0 = x1 - 1;
5141        int y0 = y1 - 1;
5142        int z0 = z1 - 1;
5143        int x2 = x1 + 1;
5144        int y2 = y1 + 1;
5145        int z2 = z1 + 1;
5146        int x3 = x1 + 2;
5147        int y3 = y1 + 2;
5148        int z3 = z1 + 2;
5149
5150        float xs = x - (float) x1;
5151        float ys = y - (float) y1;
5152        float zs = z - (float) z1;
5153
5154        return cubicLerp(
5155                cubicLerp(
5156                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y0, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y0, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y0, z0), xs),
5157                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y1, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y1, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y1, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y1, z0), xs),
5158                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y2, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y2, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y2, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y2, z0), xs),
5159                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y3, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y3, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y3, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y3, z0), xs),
5160                        ys),
5161                cubicLerp(
5162                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y0, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y0, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y0, z1), xs),
5163                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y1, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y1, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y1, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y1, z1), xs),
5164                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y2, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y2, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y2, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y2, z1), xs),
5165                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y3, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y3, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y3, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y3, z1), xs),
5166                        ys),
5167                cubicLerp(
5168                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y0, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y0, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y0, z2), xs),
5169                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y1, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y1, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y1, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y1, z2), xs),
5170                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y2, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y2, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y2, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y2, z2), xs),
5171                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y3, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y3, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y3, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y3, z2), xs),
5172                        ys),
5173                cubicLerp(
5174                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y0, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y0, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y0, z3), xs),
5175                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y1, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y1, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y1, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y1, z3), xs),

5177                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y3, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y3, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y3, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y3, z3), xs),
5178                        ys),

5263    private final static float CUBIC_2D_BOUNDING = 1f / 1.5f;
5264
5265    private float singleCubic(int seed, float x, float y) {
5266        int x1 = fastFloor(x);
5267        int y1 = fastFloor(y);
5268
5269        int x0 = x1 - 1;
5270        int y0 = y1 - 1;
5271        int x2 = x1 + 1;
5272        int y2 = y1 + 1;
5273        int x3 = x1 + 2;
5274        int y3 = y1 + 2;
5275
5276        float xs = x - (float) x1;
5277        float ys = y - (float) y1;
5278
5279        return cubicLerp(
5280                cubicLerp(valCoord2D(seed, x0, y0), valCoord2D(seed, x1, y0), valCoord2D(seed, x2, y0), valCoord2D(seed, x3, y0),
5281                        xs),
5282                cubicLerp(valCoord2D(seed, x0, y1), valCoord2D(seed, x1, y1), valCoord2D(seed, x2, y1), valCoord2D(seed, x3, y1),
5283                        xs),
5284                cubicLerp(valCoord2D(seed, x0, y2), valCoord2D(seed, x1, y2), valCoord2D(seed, x2, y2), valCoord2D(seed, x3, y2),
5285                        xs),
5286                cubicLerp(valCoord2D(seed, x0, y3), valCoord2D(seed, x1, y3), valCoord2D(seed, x2, y3), valCoord2D(seed, x3, y3),
5287                        xs),
5288                ys) * CUBIC_2D_BOUNDING;
5289    }
5290
5291
5292    public float getCubicFractal(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
5293        x *= frequency;
5294        y *= frequency;
5295        z *= frequency;
5296        w *= frequency;
5297
5298        switch (fractalType) {
5299            case FBM:
5300                return singleCubicFractalFBM(x, y, z, w);
5301            case BILLOW:
5302                return singleCubicFractalBillow(x, y, z, w);
5303            case RIDGED_MULTI:
5304                return singleCubicFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z, w);
5305            default:
5306                return 0;
5307        }
5308    }
5309
5310    private float singleCubicFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
5311        int seed = this.seed;
5312        float sum = singleCubic(seed, x, y, z, w);
5313        float amp = 1;
5314        int i = 0;
5315
5316        while (++i < octaves) {
5317            x *= lacunarity;
5318            y *= lacunarity;
5319            z *= lacunarity;
5320            w *= lacunarity;
5321
5322            amp *= gain;
5323            sum += singleCubic(++seed, x, y, z, w) * amp;
5324        }
5325
5326        return sum * fractalBounding;
5327    }
5328
5329    private float singleCubicFractalBillow(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
5330        int seed = this.seed;
5331        float sum = Math.abs(singleCubic(seed, x, y, z, w)) * 2 - 1;
5332        float amp = 1;
5333        int i = 0;
5334
5335        while (++i < octaves) {
5336            x *= lacunarity;
5337            y *= lacunarity;
5338            z *= lacunarity;
5339            w *= lacunarity;
5340
5341            amp *= gain;
5342            sum += (Math.abs(singleCubic(++seed, x, y, z, w)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
5343        }
5344
5345        return sum * fractalBounding;
5346    }
5347
5348    private float singleCubicFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
5349        int seed = this.seed;
5350        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
5351        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
5352            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleCubic(seed + i, x, y, z, w));
5353            correction += (exp *= 0.5f);
5354            sum += spike * exp;
5355            x *= lacunarity;
5356            y *= lacunarity;
5357            z *= lacunarity;
5358        }
5359        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
5360    }
5361
5362    public float getCubic(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
5363        return singleCubic(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency, z * frequency, w * frequency);
5364    }

5499
5500    // Cellular Noise
5501    public float getCellular(float x, float y, float z) {
5502        x *= frequency;
5503        y *= frequency;
5504        z *= frequency;
5505
5506        switch (cellularReturnType) {
5507            case CELL_VALUE:
5508            case NOISE_LOOKUP:
5509            case DISTANCE:
5510                return singleCellular(x, y, z);
5511            default:
5512                return singleCellular2Edge(x, y, z);
5513        }
5514    }
5515
5516    private float singleCellular(float x, float y, float z) {
5517        int xr = fastRound(x);
5518        int yr = fastRound(y);
5519        int zr = fastRound(z);
5520
5521        float distance = 999999;
5522        int xc = 0, yc = 0, zc = 0;
5523
5524        switch (cellularDistanceFunction) {
5525            case EUCLIDEAN:
5526                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5527                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5528                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5529                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5530
5531                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;
5532                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5533                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5534
5535                            float newDistance = vecX * vecX + vecY * vecY + vecZ * vecZ;
5536
5537                            if (newDistance < distance) {
5538                                distance = newDistance;
5539                                xc = xi;
5540                                yc = yi;
5541                                zc = zi;
5542                            }
5543                        }
5544                    }
5545                }
5546                break;
5547            case MANHATTAN:
5548                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5549                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5550                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5551                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5552
5553                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;
5554                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5555                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5556
5557                            float newDistance = Math.abs(vecX) + Math.abs(vecY) + Math.abs(vecZ);
5558
5559                            if (newDistance < distance) {
5560                                distance = newDistance;
5561                                xc = xi;
5562                                yc = yi;
5563                                zc = zi;
5564                            }
5565                        }
5566                    }
5567                }
5568                break;
5569            case NATURAL:
5570                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5571                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5572                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5573                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5574
5575                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;
5576                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5577                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5578
5579                            float newDistance = (Math.abs(vecX) + Math.abs(vecY) + Math.abs(vecZ)) + (vecX * vecX + vecY * vecY + vecZ * vecZ);
5580
5581                            if (newDistance < distance) {
5582                                distance = newDistance;
5583                                xc = xi;
5584                                yc = yi;
5585                                zc = zi;
5586                            }
5587                        }
5588                    }
5589                }
5590                break;
5591        }
5592
5593        switch (cellularReturnType) {
5594            case CELL_VALUE:
5595                return valCoord3D(0, xc, yc, zc);
5596
5597            case NOISE_LOOKUP:
5598                Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xc, yc, zc, seed)];
5599                return cellularNoiseLookup.getConfiguredNoise(xc + vec.x, yc + vec.y, zc + vec.z);
5600
5601            case DISTANCE:
5602                return distance - 1;
5603            default:
5604                return 0;
5605        }
5606    }

5608    private float singleCellular2Edge(float x, float y, float z) {
5609        int xr = fastRound(x);
5610        int yr = fastRound(y);
5611        int zr = fastRound(z);
5612
5613        float distance = 999999;
5614        float distance2 = 999999;
5615
5616        switch (cellularDistanceFunction) {
5617            case EUCLIDEAN:
5618                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5619                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5620                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5621                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5622
5623                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;
5624                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5625                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5626
5627                            float newDistance = vecX * vecX + vecY * vecY + vecZ * vecZ;
5628
5629                            distance2 = Math.max(Math.min(distance2, newDistance), distance);
5630                            distance = Math.min(distance, newDistance);
5631                        }
5632                    }
5633                }
5634                break;
5635            case MANHATTAN:
5636                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5637                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5638                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5639                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5640
5641                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;
5642                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5643                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5644
5645                            float newDistance = Math.abs(vecX) + Math.abs(vecY) + Math.abs(vecZ);
5646
5647                            distance2 = Math.max(Math.min(distance2, newDistance), distance);
5648                            distance = Math.min(distance, newDistance);
5649                        }
5650                    }
5651                }
5652                break;
5653            case NATURAL:
5654                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5655                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5656                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5657                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5658
5659                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;
5660                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5661                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5662
5663                            float newDistance = (Math.abs(vecX) + Math.abs(vecY) + Math.abs(vecZ)) + (vecX * vecX + vecY * vecY + vecZ * vecZ);
5664
5665                            distance2 = Math.max(Math.min(distance2, newDistance), distance);
5666                            distance = Math.min(distance, newDistance);
5667                        }
5668                    }
5669                }
5670                break;
5671            default:
5672                break;
5673        }
5674
5675        switch (cellularReturnType) {
5676            case DISTANCE_2:
5677                return distance2 - 1;
5678            case DISTANCE_2_ADD:
5679                return distance2 + distance - 1;
5680            case DISTANCE_2_SUB:
5681                return distance2 - distance - 1;
5682            case DISTANCE_2_MUL:
5683                return distance2 * distance - 1;
5684            case DISTANCE_2_DIV:
5685                return distance / distance2 - 1;
5686            default:
5687                return 0;
5688        }
5689    }

5861    public void gradientPerturbFractal3(float[] v3) {
5862        int seed = this.seed;
5863        float amp = gradientPerturbAmp * fractalBounding;
5864        float freq = frequency;
5865
5866        singleGradientPerturb3(seed, amp, frequency, v3);
5867
5868        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
5869            freq *= lacunarity;
5870            amp *= gain;
5871            singleGradientPerturb3(++seed, amp, freq, v3);
5872        }
5873    }

5875    private void singleGradientPerturb3(int seed, float perturbAmp, float frequency, float[] v3) {
5876        float xf = v3[0] * frequency;
5877        float yf = v3[1] * frequency;
5878        float zf = v3[2] * frequency;
5879
5880        int x0 = fastFloor(xf);
5881        int y0 = fastFloor(yf);
5882        int z0 = fastFloor(zf);
5883        int x1 = x0 + 1;
5884        int y1 = y0 + 1;
5885        int z1 = z0 + 1;
5886
5887        float xs, ys, zs;
5888        switch (interpolation) {
5889            default:
5890            case LINEAR:
5891                xs = xf - x0;
5892                ys = yf - y0;
5893                zs = zf - z0;
5894                break;
5895            case HERMITE:
5896                xs = hermiteInterpolator(xf - x0);
5897                ys = hermiteInterpolator(yf - y0);
5898                zs = hermiteInterpolator(zf - z0);
5899                break;
5900            case QUINTIC:
5901                xs = quinticInterpolator(xf - x0);
5902                ys = quinticInterpolator(yf - y0);
5903                zs = quinticInterpolator(zf - z0);
5904                break;
5905        }
5906
5907        Float3 vec0 = CELL_3D[hash256(x0, y0, z0, seed)];
5908        Float3 vec1 = CELL_3D[hash256(x1, y0, z0, seed)];
5909
5910        float lx0x = lerp(vec0.x, vec1.x, xs);
5911        float ly0x = lerp(vec0.y, vec1.y, xs);
5912        float lz0x = lerp(vec0.z, vec1.z, xs);
5913
5914        vec0 = CELL_3D[hash256(x0, y1, z0, seed)];
5915        vec1 = CELL_3D[hash256(x1, y1, z0, seed)];
5916
5917        float lx1x = lerp(vec0.x, vec1.x, xs);
5918        float ly1x = lerp(vec0.y, vec1.y, xs);
5919        float lz1x = lerp(vec0.z, vec1.z, xs);
5920
5921        float lx0y = lerp(lx0x, lx1x, ys);
5922        float ly0y = lerp(ly0x, ly1x, ys);
5923        float lz0y = lerp(lz0x, lz1x, ys);
5924
5925        vec0 = CELL_3D[hash256(x0, y0, z1, seed)];
5926        vec1 = CELL_3D[hash256(x1, y0, z1, seed)];
5927
5928        lx0x = lerp(vec0.x, vec1.x, xs);
5929        ly0x = lerp(vec0.y, vec1.y, xs);
5930        lz0x = lerp(vec0.z, vec1.z, xs);
5931
5932        vec0 = CELL_3D[hash256(x0, y1, z1, seed)];
5933        vec1 = CELL_3D[hash256(x1, y1, z1, seed)];
5934
5935        lx1x = lerp(vec0.x, vec1.x, xs);
5936        ly1x = lerp(vec0.y, vec1.y, xs);
5937        lz1x = lerp(vec0.z, vec1.z, xs);
5938
5939        v3[0] += lerp(lx0y, lerp(lx0x, lx1x, ys), zs) * perturbAmp;
5940        v3[1] += lerp(ly0y, lerp(ly0x, ly1x, ys), zs) * perturbAmp;
5941        v3[2] += lerp(lz0y, lerp(lz0x, lz1x, ys), zs) * perturbAmp;
5942    }

5962    private void singleGradientPerturb2(int seed, float perturbAmp, float frequency, float[] v2) {

5964        float yf = v2[1] * frequency;
5965
5966        int x0 = fastFloor(xf);
5967        int y0 = fastFloor(yf);
5968        int x1 = x0 + 1;
5969        int y1 = y0 + 1;
5970
5971        float xs, ys;
5972        switch (interpolation) {
5973            default:
5974            case LINEAR:
5975                xs = xf - x0;
5976                ys = yf - y0;
5977                break;
5978            case HERMITE:
5979                xs = hermiteInterpolator(xf - x0);
5980                ys = hermiteInterpolator(yf - y0);
5981                break;
5982            case QUINTIC:
5983                xs = quinticInterpolator(xf - x0);
5984                ys = quinticInterpolator(yf - y0);
5985                break;
5986        }
5987
5988        Float2 vec0 = CELL_2D[hash256(x0, y0, seed)];
5989        Float2 vec1 = CELL_2D[hash256(x1, y0, seed)];
5990
5991        float lx0x = lerp(vec0.x, vec1.x, xs);
5992        float ly0x = lerp(vec0.y, vec1.y, xs);
5993
5994        vec0 = CELL_2D[hash256(x0, y1, seed)];
5995        vec1 = CELL_2D[hash256(x1, y1, seed)];
5996
5997        float lx1x = lerp(vec0.x, vec1.x, xs);
5998        float ly1x = lerp(vec0.y, vec1.y, xs);
5999
6000        v2[0] += lerp(lx0x, lx1x, ys) * perturbAmp;
6001        v2[1] += lerp(ly0x, ly1x, ys) * perturbAmp;
6002    }

6009    public float singleHoney(int seed, float x, float y) {
6010        final float result = (singleSimplex(seed, x, y) + singleValue(seed ^ 0x9E3779B9, x, y)) * 0.5f + 1f;
6011        return (result <= 1f) ? result * result - 1f : (result - 2f) * -(result - 2f) + 1f;
6012
6013        //return singleSimplex(seed, x, y, 0.5f * singleSimplex(seed * 0xDAB ^ 0x9E3779BD, x, y));
6014//        return singleSimplex(seed, x, y + 0.25f * singleSimplex(seed * 0xDAB ^ 0x9E3779BD, y, x));
6015//        return singleSimplex(seed, x + NumberTools.swayRandomized(seed, y) * 0.25f, y + NumberTools.swayRandomized(seed, x) * 0.25f);
6016        
6017//        final float a = singleSimplex(seed, x, y);
6018//        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
6019//        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
6020//        final float b = singleSimplex(seed, x + a * 0.25f, y);
6021//        return NumberTools.sin_((a + b) * 0.25f); 
6022    }

6024    public float getHoneyFractal(float x, float y) {
6025        x *= frequency;
6026        y *= frequency;
6027
6028        switch (fractalType) {
6029            case FBM:
6030                return singleHoneyFractalFBM(x, y);
6031            case BILLOW:
6032                return singleHoneyFractalBillow(x, y);
6033            case RIDGED_MULTI:
6034                return singleHoneyFractalRidgedMulti(x, y);
6035            default:
6036                return 0;
6037        }
6038    }
6039
6040    private float singleHoneyFractalFBM(float x, float y) {
6041        int seed = this.seed;
6042        float sum = singleHoney(seed, x, y);
6043        float amp = 1, t;
6044
6045        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
6046            t = x;
6047            x = y * lacunarity;
6048            y = t * lacunarity;
6049
6050            amp *= gain;
6051            sum += singleHoney(seed + i, x, y) * amp;
6052        }
6053
6054        return sum * fractalBounding;
6055    }
6056
6057    private float singleHoneyFractalBillow(float x, float y) {
6058        int seed = this.seed;
6059        float sum = Math.abs(singleHoney(seed, x, y)) * 2 - 1;
6060        float amp = 1, t;
6061
6062        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
6063            t = x;
6064            x = y * lacunarity;
6065            y = t * lacunarity;
6066
6067            amp *= gain;
6068            sum += (Math.abs(singleHoney(++seed, x, y)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
6069        }
6070
6071        return sum * fractalBounding;
6072    }
6073
6074    private float singleHoneyFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y) {
6075        int seed = this.seed;
6076        float t;
6077        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
6078        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
6079            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleHoney(seed + i, x, y));
6080            correction += (exp *= 0.5f);
6081            sum += spike * exp;
6082            t = x;
6083            x = y * lacunarity;
6084            y = t * lacunarity;
6085        }
6086        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
6087    }
6088
6089    public float getHoneyFractal(float x, float y, float z) {
6090        x *= frequency;
6091        y *= frequency;
6092        z *= frequency;
6093
6094        switch (fractalType) {
6095            case FBM:
6096                return singleHoneyFractalFBM(x, y, z);
6097            case BILLOW:
6098                return singleHoneyFractalBillow(x, y, z);
6099            case RIDGED_MULTI:
6100                return singleHoneyFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z);
6101            default:
6102                return 0;
6103        }
6104    }
6105
6106    private float singleHoneyFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z) {
6107        int seed = this.seed;
6108        float sum = singleHoney(seed, x, y, z);
6109        float amp = 1;
6110
6111        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
6112            x *= lacunarity;
6113            y *= lacunarity;
6114            z *= lacunarity;
6115
6116            amp *= gain;
6117            sum += singleHoney(++seed, x, y, z) * amp;
6118        }
6119
6120        return sum * fractalBounding;
6121    }
6122
6123    private float singleHoneyFractalBillow(float x, float y, float z) {
6124        int seed = this.seed;
6125        float sum = Math.abs(singleHoney(seed, x, y, z)) * 2 - 1;
6126        float amp = 1;
6127
6128        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
6129            x *= lacunarity;
6130            y *= lacunarity;
6131            z *= lacunarity;
6132
6133            amp *= gain;
6134            sum += (Math.abs(singleHoney(++seed, x, y, z)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
6135        }
6136
6137        return sum * fractalBounding;
6138    }
6139
6140    private float singleHoneyFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z) {
6141        int seed = this.seed;
6142        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
6143        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
6144            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleHoney(seed + i, x, y, z));
6145            correction += (exp *= 0.5f);
6146            sum += spike * exp;
6147            x *= lacunarity;
6148            y *= lacunarity;
6149            z *= lacunarity;
6150        }
6151        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
6152    }

6223    public float getHoneyFractal(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
6224        x *= frequency;
6225        y *= frequency;
6226        z *= frequency;
6227        w *= frequency;
6228        u *= frequency;
6229
6230        switch (fractalType) {
6231            case FBM:
6232                return singleHoneyFractalFBM(x, y, z, w, u);
6233            case BILLOW:
6234                return singleHoneyFractalBillow(x, y, z, w, u);
6235            case RIDGED_MULTI:
6236                return singleHoneyFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z, w, u);
6237            default:
6238                return 0;
6239        }
6240    }

6859     * This gradient vector array was quasi-randomly generated after a lot of rejection sampling. Each gradient should
6860     * have a magnitude of 2.0, matching the magnitude of the center of an edge of a 5D hypercube.
6861     * This may bias slightly in some directions. The sums of the x, y, z, w, and u components of all 256 vectors are:
6862     * <br>
6863     * x: +0.52959638973427, y: +0.31401370534460, z: -0.14792091580658, w: -0.00781214643439, u: -0.58206620017072
6864     * <br>
6865     * Most of the rejected sets of 256 vectors had some component sums at 10 or more, so having all of these close to
6866     * 0.0 is good. The specific technique used here was to redistribute the x, y, z, w, and u components of 5D points
6867     * from the R5 sequence, putting them on a Gaussian distribution using {@link MathExtras#probit(double)} and then
6868     * normalizing the resulting 5D vector. Because the R5 sequence is quasi-random (it only very rarely returns clumps
6869     * of points that are close-together in both the sequence and in space), the Gaussian points were more likely to be
6870     * quasi-random as well, and far fewer point sets needed to be rejected.
6871     */
